sentences.en: It is a neighbourhood beset by all the usual inner-city problems.
sentences.cn: 这是个受所有常见市中心区问题所困扰的市区。

sentences.en: The government will continue to try to regenerate inner-city areas.
sentences.cn: 政府将继续努力重建市区内部。

sentences.en: Children living in inner-city areas may be educationally disadvantaged.
sentences.cn: 居住在市中心贫民区的孩子在教育方面可能处于不利的地位。
